newsitem.title: USA: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 106.3 Nov 29 wk.
newsitem.headline: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 106.3 Nov 29 wk.

text.p: The Economic Cycle Research Institute (ECRI) weekly future inflation gauge (FIG) rose to 106.3 in the week ended November 29 from a revised 106.0 the previous week, ECRI said.

Faster growth in real estate loans, an increase in the growth rate of industrial materials prices and a narrowing of the yield spread between 10-year and three-month Treasuries helped push the index up, ECRI said.
"While inflation pressures are slightly higher than they were two months ago, they are not yet pointing to an imminent inflation upturn," ECRI said.
